import "array"

// 1. Get the latest Gold Price (Oz)
gold = from(bucket: "finance_data")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["symbol"] == "GC=F")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "price")
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

// 2. Get the latest Silver Price (Oz)
silver = from(bucket: "finance_data")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["symbol"] == "SI=F")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "price")
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

// 3. Calculate Ratio and display
array.from(rows: [{
    _time: now(), 
    _value: gold._value / silver._value
}])
  |> yield(name: "Gold/Silver Ratio")

options.content: Charts scale dynamically to the dashboard time filter

targets.query:
from(bucket: "finance_data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "market_price")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["symbol"] == "GC=F")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "price")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Gold Price")
